DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine addition high-dose methotrexate prior standard treatment improve survival patient malignant high-grade glioma diffuse intrinsic pontine glioma compare standard treatment . Secondary - Determine addition high-dose methotrexate , compare standard treatment , improve tumor response patient . - Determine high-dose methotrexate , compare standard treatment , improve progression-free event-free survival patient . - Determine high-dose methotrexate , compare standard treatment , improve health status ( quality life ) patient . - Determine consolidation therapy improve overall , progression-free , event-free survival rate compare historical control group . OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord tumor location include pons ( yes v ) complete nearly complete resection ( yes v ) . - Surgery : All patient encourage undergo radical resection tumor reduce intracranial pressure , remove much tumor tissue possible , obtain tumor tissue histological diagnosis . Within 14 day surgery , patient proceed induction chemotherapy . - Induction therapy : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : - High-dose methotrexate leucovorin calcium : Patients receive high-dose methotrexate IV 24 hour day 1 15 leucovorin calcium IV every 6 hour day 2-3 16-17 . Patients proceed chemoradiotherapy 4 week later . - Chemoradiotherapy ( course 1 ) : Patients undergo external beam radiotherapy daily , 5 day week , approximately 6 week . Beginning first day radiotherapy , patient receive cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1-5 , etoposide IV 2 hour day 1-3 , vincristine IV day 5 , 12 , 19 , 26 , 33 . Patients proceed course 2 chemoradiotherapy 7 day prior completion radiotherapy . - Chemoradiotherapy ( course 2 ) : Patients receive ifosfamide IV 1 hour cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1-5 , etoposide IV 2 hour day 1-3 , vincristine IV day 5 . Patients proceed consolidation chemotherapy 4 week later . - Arm II : Patients receive chemoradiotherapy course 1 2 arm I proceed consolidation chemotherapy 4 week later . - Consolidation chemotherapy : Patients receive vincristine IV day 1 , 8 , 15 , oral lomustine day 2 , oral prednisone daily day 1-17 . Treatment repeat every 6 week 8 course . Quality life assess 1 week surgery , completion chemoradiotherapy , 1 , 4 , 13 month completion consolidation chemotherapy , annually 3 year . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically 3 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 150 patient accrue study .
